Wood.name: Wood
Wood.desc: A plank of wood that can be used to create all sorts of things.

Ruby.name: Ruby
Ruby.desc: A small gem that can be used to create or enhance all sorts of things.

Emerald.name: Emerald
Emerald.desc: A small gem that can be used to create or enhance all sorts of things.

Diamond.name: Diamond
Diamond.desc: A small gem that can be used to create or enhance all sorts of things.

Shovel.name: Shovel
Shovel.desc: A shovel that can be picked up to raise attack stat by 8 and use Magnara.

WornOutSword.name: Worn-out Sword
WornOutSword.desc: A worn out sword that can be equipped to raise atk stat by 5.

WornOutWand.name: Worn-out Wand
WornOutWand.desc: A worn out want that can be equipped to raise mag stat by 5.

WornOutShield.name: Worn-out Shield
WornOutShield.desc: A worn out shield that can be equipped to raise def stat by 5.

WoodenSword.name: Wooden Sword
WoodenSword.desc: An old sword made out of wood that can be equipped to raise atk stat by 8.

WoodenWand.name: Wooden Wand
WoodenWand.desc: An old wand made out of wood that can be equipped to raise mag stat by 8.

WoodenShield.name: Wooden Shield
WoodenShield.desc: An old shield made out of wood that can be equipped to raise def stat by 8.

SteelSword.name: Steel Sword
SteelSword.desc: A steel sword used for both offense and defense that can be equipped to raise atk stat by 8 and def stat by 5.

SteelShield.name: Steel Shield
SteelShield.desc: A steel shield used for defense that can be equipped to raise def stat by 15. It also changes your melee attack to Strike Type, and raises it's power slightly.

SteelWand.name: Steel Wand
SteelWand.desc: A steel wand used for both offense and defense that can be equipped to raise mag stat by 8 and def stat by 5. It also changes your melee attack to Bless Type, and raises it's power slightly.

RoboticFist.name: Robotic Fist
RoboticFist.desc: A part of a robot that was broken off. It can be used to raise attack stat by 15, and use Gigantic Fist. It also changes your melee attack to Strike Type, and raises it's power greatly.

RoboticFlamethrower.name: Robotic Flamethrower
RoboticFlamethrower.desc: A part of a robot that was broken off. It can be used to raise magic stat by 15, and use Flamethrower. It also changes your melee attack to Fire Type, and raises it's power slightly.

WaterGun.name: Water Gun
WaterGun.desc: A part of a robot that was broken off. It can be used to raise magic stat by 15, and use Scald. It also changes your melee attack to Water Type, and raises it's power greatly.

FrozenFist.name: Frozen Fist
FrozenFist.desc: A frozen fist of some sort of animal. It can be used to raise attack stat by 18, and use Megaton Raid. It also changes your melee attack to Ice Type, and raises it's power greatly.

IcyFang.name: Icy Fang
IcyFang.desc: A frozen fang of some sort of animal. It can be used to raise attack stat by 15, and use Ice Fang. It also changes your melee attack to Ice Type, and raises it's power greatly.

GrassGem.name: Grass Gem
GrassGem.desc: One of the various elemental crystals. It can be used to raise all stats by 5, and use Grassy Terrain. It also changes your melee attack to Grass Type, and raises it's power slightly.

FrostGem.name: Frost Gem
FrostGem.desc: One of the various elemental crystals. It can be used to raise all stats by 4, and use Blizzard.

NukeLaunch.name: Nuke Launcher
NukeLaunch.desc: A rare weapon that is possible to launch radiation at a foe without needing ammo. It allows the user to use Freila. It also changes the user's melee attack to Nuclear Type, and raise it's power greatly.

SliceOfPizza.name: Slice of Pizza
SliceOfPizza.desc: Yummy! Pizza! This item restores one ally's HP by 50.

ChickenNugget.name: Chicken Nugget
ChickenNugget.desc: Just a chicken nugget. Restores one ally's HP by 20.

Potion.name: Potion
Potion.desc: If one were to drink this, their HP would be restored by 80.

MPPotion.name: MP Potion
MPPotion.desc: If one were to drink this, their MP would be restored by 60.

BottleOfWater.name: Bottle of Water
BottleOfWater.desc: Just water. Restores HP & MP by 50.

SparkleBerry.name: Sparkle Berry
SparkleBerry.desc: A berry that is said to taste really good. Restores HP by 65.

ShineBerry.name: Shine Berry
ShineBerry.desc: A berry that is said to taste really good. Restores MP by 50.

PlumpBerry.name: Plump Berry
PlumpBerry.desc: A berry that is said to taste really good. Restores HP & MP by 50.

BerryBlend.name: Berry Blend
BerryBlend.desc: A tasty, soft sponge cake tasting of 3 different berries. Restores 150 HP & 150 MP.

RevivalSpray.name: Revival Spray
RevivalSpray.desc: Spray this on someone's wounds to wake them up from unconciousness.

SuperPotion.name: Super Potion
SuperPotion.desc: If one were to drink this, their HP would be restored by 160.

MolotovCocktail.name: Molotov Cocktail
MolotovCocktail.desc: A throwable cocktail full of fire that explodes upon contact after a throw.

Revitalizer.name: Revitalizer
Revitalizer.desc: This item grants people to be able to heal each turn while equipped.

RailGun.name: Rail Gun
RailGun.desc: To use this gun, you'll probably need to lower your defenses.

InconspicuousCan.name: Inconspicuous Can
InconspicuousCan.desc: A seemingly regular black soda can...?

CookedTurkey.name: Cooked Turkey
CookedTurkey.desc: A whole Thanksgiving cooked turkey for the party to enjoy together. Pass the mashed potatoes! üòã

PoisonLeaf.name: Poison Leaf
PoisonLeaf.desc: Cover yourself with a Poison Leaf.

BloomBattlerBreaker.name: BloomBattlerBreaker
BloomBattlerBreaker.desc: A mysterious item that can break Bloom Battler. It's best not to ask why it exists.

KillerPotion.name: Killer Potion
KillerPotion.desc: Toss a killer potion to instantly down the foe.

MagikaPoison.name: Magika Poison
MagikaPoison.desc: This grants the use of Magika Poison, be aware there's no gain for this stat wise.

ConspicuousOldGun.name: Conspicuous Old Gun
ConspicuousOldGun.desc: An old weapon used to attack things from afar, remember to keep safety on unless fighting something. The best form of stress relief. It increases Strength by 9 because of how heavy it is...

ConspicuousOldRifle.name: Conspicuous Old Rifle
ConspicuousOldRifle.desc: An old weapon used to attack things from up close, remember to keep safety on unless fighting something. Remember, no matter how bad your aim is, friendly fire is never permitted. It increases Strength by 18 because of how insanely heavy it is...
